meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Pat Stivers Kathy Applebaum Marv Macintyre Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2804.

td.p: Pat Stivers, an international consultant from Phoenix, Arizona
Kathy Applebaum, a retail store clerk from Sacramento, California
Marv Macintyre, a development director from Nashua, New Hampshire (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,400)

tr.td: METALLIC STARS
WORLD GEOGRAPHY
FOOD
U.S. HISTORY
RAYMOND LOEWY DESIGNS
ABBREVIATIONS
